main_symptom: Renal failure, the owner declines further examination and放弃 treatment.
zhu_su:
主诉这两天在家不愿活动，没有食欲，状态较差，视诊发现脱水严重，神经反射低，状态极差，半休克状态，
生化检查发现肾脏指标爆表，肌酐1750+，严重贫血，
主人不做进一步检查，放弃治疗，
正常费用610，主人一再坚持没有钱放弃治疗，又让宠宠轩打电话，实收500元

main_symptom:
1. Critically ill
2. Suspected jaundice, pending further investigation
3. Shortness of breath
Owner has opted to放弃 treatment and euthanasia

可视黏膜黄染，眼球下陷。

main_symptom:
Y Drip Trichomoniasis Hemorrhagic Gastrointestinal Syndrome: Currently undergoing examination for fecal trichomoniasis infection, with high inflammation and negative for pancreatitis. After consultation with the owner, it has been decided to initiate intravenous fluid therapy for 3 days; if symptoms improve, treatment can be switched to injections combined with oral medication. The treatment duration for this condition is relatively long and requires patient cooperation. Additionally, trichomoniasis is stubborn and prone to recurrence. During treatment, due to decreased immunity, there is a possibility of诱发 other diseases, such as respiratory diseases. If there is no significant improvement in symptoms, the presence of foreign bodies and other internal medical conditions will need to be considered at that time.

Owner's Signature:
zhu_su: 在家呕吐数次 腹泻拉血 精神明显下降 食欲不佳 很久未做驱虫 疫苗按时接种

main_symptom: Interdigital abscess, nail断裂
zhu_su: 三天前指甲断裂，自己在家处理戴的头套偏小，可以舔到，脚趾红肿，伤口有化脓，吃喝大小便正常，疫苗驱虫按时做的。
final_disease: Rupture of the Extensor Digitorum Longus Tendon

临床检查；牙龈、黏膜颜色粉红  crt>2s  牙齿情况良好  牙龈未见明显异常  眼结膜未见明显异常  瞳缩正常  眼睑无明显内外翻  耳道清洁 鼻头湿润  诱咳阴性  触诊下颌、股内淋巴结尚可  阴部未见明显异常  肛周清洁  关节活动无明显异常 触诊腹部，前腹部疼痛明显 听诊呼吸音、心音无明显异常  精神紧张

化验：血常规白细胞0.46（免费做）
CPV PCR：阴性

印诊；肠道异物；拟胰腺炎
医嘱；1  202

main_symptom: F: Feline panleukopenia screening was negative, informed that it may not be detectable during the incubation period or before entering the排毒 period. Preliminary diagnosis is gastroenteritis, with the possibility of internal medical conditions and foreign bodies not excluded. Initial treatment with injections will be administered, and if there is no improvement, further examination or intravenous therapy will be considered.
zhu_su: 一周前换粮，有过渡，昨晚出现呕吐，早上起床发现地面有两三摊呕吐物，今日呕吐约7.8次，今日出现腹泻，不清楚是否有进食，母鸡蹲，自助采食最近吃较多的冻干

main_symptom: Mental state poor, slightly short of breath, heart rate temporarily stable, limbs weak, unable to stand, body emitting a foul odor, numerous maggots around the damaged anus, eyes lackluster, nose dry, copious pus discharge from both ears, both hind limbs damaged, left hind limb severely swollen and ulcerated with abundant purulent secretions, cutaneous muscle reflexes relatively good, proprioceptive response消失 in the left hind limb, deep pain response消失, neural reflexes temporarily stable, proprioceptive response in the right hind limb sluggish, deep pain response relatively good, weak control over urination and defecation, requiring artificial assistance for bowel movements, poor gastrointestinal motility; significant osteophyte formation in the lumbar and thoracic vertebrae, bridging observed; blood routine examination revealed white blood cell counts of 27.8/40.3/52, all three readings significantly elevated, marked anemia (showing gradual improvement over three tests); CRP test indicated severe inflammatory infection; comprehensive liver and kidney function tests showed low albumin, abnormal liver function, and creatine kinase level at 2458 (indicating severe pain).
zhu_su: 流浪狗,后肢站立不起,全身臭
final_symptom: Generalized or localized skeletal muscle weakness

main_symptom: External auditory canal: Malassezia +; Skin: Cocci +; Dermoscopy: No fungi observed, no mites observed,少量cocci,少量degenerative neutrophils.
zhu_su:
1个月前看过耳朵有球菌感染，有用洗耳水+耳药，连续用了1星期，后面就一周洗两次耳朵，当时耳朵也挠破了，用了药。四天前喂了新的猫条，第二天后开始出现抓挠耳朵
环境：去年12月中旬从第二任主人（养了一星期）那领养回来，换了新的猫粮（没有过渡）
既往史：每个月都有两三天大便末端软便带血（鲜血），做了驱虫就好了，没有用药
驱虫：4.27号用了爱沃克（之前用的大宠爱）

main_symptom: Respiratory tract infection; the owner is not considering an examination for the time being and will prescribe medication based on symptoms first. If there is no improvement or if the condition worsens later, intravenous therapy or treatment after examination is recommended. Respiratory conditions generally improve slowly, and medication takes effect more gradually, with an estimated recovery time of around two weeks. The owner has opted to放弃 treatment due to the cost and will not prescribe medication.
zhu_su: 主诉昨前天开始精神下降，食欲目前正常，大小便正常。在家频繁打喷嚏流鼻涕，目前没有咳嗽

main_symptom: Feline Panleukopenia strongly positive,放弃治疗
zhu_su: 两天前刚买的两只小猫，当时测了传染病都正常，吃喝大小便也都正常，今天下班回家发现没吃东西，半休克，一直张嘴喘，未免疫驱虫，家里还有一只大猫和一只小猫

main_symptom: Hypothyroidism; Interdigital Dermatitis
